meaningMnemonic:
A <radical>tsunami</radical> hit ancient <radical>China</radical> and formed the <kanji>Chinese</kanji> country we know now as... <kanji>China</kanji>!

Sometimes this kanji also means <kanji>man</kanji>. In fact, it used to refer specifically to people of the Han dynasty, but over time evolved into a term for men in specific contexts.
readingMnemonic: You peer closer at <kanji>China</kanji> and see one man, Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん), leading his troops into the vast country, ready to conquer all the Chinese people living in China!
